AddOn-API¶

Script.do_it(context, type_k, pro_v, pro_e, radius_k, res_k, radius_e, res_e, smooth, data)¶

initializing global lists list_vert and list_face and calling methods to create knots, edges and object

Parameters:
  • context (context) – actual context
  • type_k (enumeration ["ICO", "UV", "CUBE"]) – type of knots
  • pro_v (boolean) – option to choose Pro-Vertex-Radius for knots
  • pro_e (boolean) – option to choose Pro-Vertex-Radius for edges
  • radius_k (float) – radius of knots
  • res_k (int) – resolution of knots
  • radius_e (float) – radius of edges
  • res_e (int) – resolution of edges
  • smooth (boolean) – Option to use smooth shading
  • data (list [list of vertices, list of bmesh edges, world matrix, edge resolution]) – data of input wireframe
Returns:

‘FINISHED’
Script.load_data(fileName)¶

load a ‘.dmh’-File

Parameters:fileName (str.) – Path and name of file
Returns:none – saving data in global lists list_vert and list_face
Script.make_obj(smooth, data)¶

create a new object by using parameters and global lists list_vert and list_face

Parameters:
  • smooth (boolean) – Option to use smooth shading
  • data (list [list of vertices, list of bmesh edges, world matrix, edge resolution]) – data of input wireframe
Returns:

none
Script.save_data(fileName)¶

save a ‘.dmh’-File

Parameters:fileName (str.) – Path and name of file
Returns:none – saving global lists list_vert and list_face to file in json format
